fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Instantly control a player each day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- As you control a player, you may force them to target a player of your choice.
- They will use a night ability that will be converted to a day ability as the host deems fit.
- You will learn your target's role.
- You have a Basic autovest.
- Roleblock and control immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
